item.title: Gerri add a quote by Tom Upton
item.description: "I really should come with a warning label." -- Tom Upton

item.title: Gerri add a quote by Sarah Vowell
item.description: "I no longer drink nearly as much as I used to but, still, my motto is Sine coffea nihil sum. Without coffee, I'm nothing." -- Sarah Vowell

item.title: Gerri add a quote by Tom Upton
item.description: "Other than the voices in my head, I think I’m pretty normal." -- Tom Upton

item.title: Gerri add a quote by Tom Upton
item.description: "...Life is much simpler if you don’t notice anything...." -- Tom Upton

item.title: Gerri add a quote by Robyn Donald
item.description: "...the collective wisdom of humanity [is] enshrined in its poetry." -- Robyn Donald

item.title: Gerri add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "History dressed up in the glow of love’s kiss turned grief into beauty." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Gerri add a quote by J.D. Stroube
item.description: "Life is filled with unanswered questions, but it is the courage to seek those answers that continues to give meaning to life. You can spend your life wallowing in despair, wondering why you were the one who was led towards the road strewn with pain, or you can be grateful that you are strong enough to survive it." -- J.D. Stroube

item.title: Gerri add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Compassion crowns the soul with its truest victory." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Gerri add a quote by J.D. Stroube
item.description: "A complete stranger has the capacity to alter the life of another irrevocably. This domino effect has the capacity to change the course of an entire world. That is what life is; a chain reaction of individuals colliding with others and influencing their lives without realizing it. A decision that seems miniscule to you, may be monumental to the fate of the world." -- J.D. Stroube

item.title: Gerri add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Then came the healing time, hearts started to shine, soul felt so fine, oh what a freeing time it was." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Gerri add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "No woman ever ages beyond eighteen in her heart." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Gerri add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Now come the whispers bearing bouquets of moonbeams and sunlight tremblings." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Gerri add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Authentic inspiration endows individuals with mental or spiritual energy which they are then able to transform into positive action. It can make all the difference between a man, woman, or child allowing despair to permanently paralyze any dreams they may have for their lives, or, exercising sufficient strength of will to make those dreams a reality." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Gerri add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Love as a concrete foundation for an authentically functional civilization requires the around-the-clock labors of forgiveness. Without it, Love fails, Friendship fails, Intelligence fails, Humanity: fails." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Gerri add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.’s dream was a manifestation of hope that humanity might one day get out of its own way by finding the courage to realize that love and nonviolence are not indicators of weakness but gifts of significant strength." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Gerri add a quote by Pablo
item.description: "Stay away from conflictive, negative people that pull you down, because they contaminate your energy and impede your progress. Search for people who look at the world with optimism, that inspire you, make you happy and provide peace of mind." -- Pablo

item.title: Gerri add a quote by W.E.B. Du Bois
item.description: "Eastward and westward storms are breaking,--great, ugly whirlwinds of hatred and blood and cruelty. I will not believe them inevitable." -- W.E.B. Du Bois
